Articles.Content:
Sorry for posting so many of these threads ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I lost my last save due to the 'Ass Kraken' according to KSP Wiki, so I created a new save. It has MechJeb, OuterPlanets Mod, and Distant Object Enhancement. 

Everytime I do something major and return to the Space Center, the game is either a weird blue ball (I've seen this happen to someone in a video) or completely black other than the top menus. I restart the game and its fine but it is really annoying. ![:(](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_sad.gif)

I think if I do Space Center through the upper menu its black and through the ESC menu its blue. When I load another saved game it works fine but I have to restart to fix the main game.

Any advice?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-02-28T17:17:20Z" title="02/28/2015 05:17  PM" data-short="9 yr">February 28, 2015</time> by whiterafter**

I have three suggestions:

1. If you are running the x64 bit version, don't. Stick to x32 bit.
2. Remove your mods, and try booting up KSP again, it may be a mod conflict which is causing this issue.
3. Re-install KSP (most likely this will solve your problem).

I hope this helps! This type of Kraken is the worst, and it sucks that you have had to encounter this...
